subject: NCAA Basketball Tournament (Men)
Basketball
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: The No. 1-seeded Tar Heels won handily against overmatched, 16th-seeded Radford, advancing to a second-round South Region game against eighth-seeded Louisiana State.
snippet: The No. 1-seeded Tar Heels won handily against overmatched, 16th-seeded Radford, advancing to a second-round South Region game against eighth-seeded Louisiana State.
